Name: concentrated solar power plant construction, solar tower power plant, 20 MW | concentrated solar power plant, solar tower, 20 MW | EN15804GD, U
Category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/422:Construction of utility projects/4220:Construction of utility projects
Description: This dataset has been extrapolated from a dataset modelled for the location Upington, South Africa. Uncertainty has not been adjusted as it is assumed that the modelled 20 MW solar tower power plant would be very similar in other parts of the world.
Tags: Concentrated Solar Power,CSP,Sector: Infrastructure & Machinery; Electricity
